SEARCH
Package thijzert.chatty.client.gui.scene

Class MainScene

java.lang.Object
thijzert.chatty.client.gui.scene.MainScene
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChattyScene
public final class MainScene extends Object implements ChattyScene
The main scene of Chatty GUI (home scene). It implements ThijzertScene.
Author:
Thijzert

  • Constructor Details

    • MainScene

      public MainScene(WindowData windowData)
      Initializes the class. It creates all the components, but it doesn't switch to the scene.

  • Method Details

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage(Object message)
      Receives the messages from the server and handles it (by putting it on the screen for example).
      Parameters:
      message - the message to handle (should be a Message if everything is working right)
      See Also:
      • Message

    • showChatMessageNotification

      private void showChatMessageNotification(ChatMessage chatMessage)
      Shows a TextMessage in the shape of a notification on the screen when the main Stage is not focused.
      See Also:
      • TextMessage
      • Window.isFocused()

      Parameters:
